### Computing Environment

-   [ ] learn how computing works (computing abstractions, operating systems graphics hardware, applications/software, filesystems, etc.)
-   [ ] learn shell scripting for generalizing tasks across hardware/operating systems

### workflow/pipeline

-   [ ] reproducibility/open science
-   [ ] todo list

### raw data / code

-   [ ] learn how to use this
-   [ ] dataframe concepts

### Derivatives

-   [ ] data wrangling in Python/R
-   [ ] learn how to graph in Python/R
-   [ ] implementation of intermediate steps
-   [ ] inferential statistics

## Meta-learning

-   [ ] How to learn as a scientist: How do I learn how to do ... ?
-   [ ] Acquire specific capabilities/skills: How do I find out what I need to learn to do ... ?
-   [ ] Cultivating capabilities through stepwise approximation : What initial step do I take?


```{mermaid}

graph TD;
    A[Computing Environment] -->|Arrow| B[Workflow / Pipeline]
    B -->|Arrow| C[Analysis Derivatives]
    C -->|Arrow| D[Analysis Results]
    D -->|Arrow| E[Manuscript]
    E -->|Arrow| F[Publication]

```
